_comment: Created by EFisher on 24/01/2014 16:53:52 using v2.0
title: How has the number of staff working extra hours changed by provider?
analysis_commentary: Staff survey reports are also published at provider level so we are able to compare changes in the number of staff reporting working extra hours (both unpaid and paid) between 2011 and 2012 and an increase was seen in 218 trusts (89% of all trusts that exist in both the 2011 and 2012 data). The reported increases are seen across most trusts. The change in the set of organisations where there is an increased reporting of working extra hours ranges between >0% and 13.78%.
data_source: Department of Health, Survey of NHS staff
